short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to view iconfont

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just install it and when you visit the iconfont css file URL in your browser you will see all the icons of that file and can easily copy to your clipboard by clicking on the icon. Additionally, it provides a user-friendly feature toggle, when you want to view the original file content, just click on the extension icon to deactivate the preview mode.
